title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available
description: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open/Close project options are not always available as expected.
OB: The Open/Close project options are sometimes not available when both P1 and P2 are selected.
EB: The Open/Close project options should always be available when both P1 and P2 are selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Select both P1 and P2.  
2. Verify if the Open/Close project options are available. If they are not, note down the circumstances under which they are not available such as specific projects or project types.
